message.body: when I thought up of a video upload zite, I thought it should share videos through standard bittorent instead of zeronet. This way you can use the actual videos on bittorrent as links too. I know this might be too advanced, to integrate zeronet to a full blown bittorent client, but I thought I should throw it out there. @Kaffie@zid you did an amazing job with zerotube!

@kaffie@zid Thank you for explaining it. You did great with the video explaining how to upload. I wonder how long it will take for something like bittorrent to become integrated, it seems like that is the ultimate requirement for zeronet to become a mass product.
